dmca.title: Case ID 16669172 - Notice of Claimed Infringement
dmca.body:
EN


-----Original Message-----
From: MPAACopyright [mailto:MPAA@copyright.org] 
Sent: Thursday, November 04, 2004 4:30 PM
To: Lance Crosby JD
Subject: Case ID 16669172 - Notice of Claimed Infringement

MOTION PICTURE ASSOCIATION OF AMERICA, INC.
15503 VENTURA BOULEVARD
ENCINO, CALIFORNIA 91436
UNITED STATES

Anti-Piracy Operations
PHONE: (818) 728 - 8127
Email: MPAA@copyright.org <mailto:MPAA@copyright.org>

Thursday, November 04, 2004

Name:        Lance Crosby, JD
ISP:        ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

Via Fax/Email

RE:        Unauthorized Use of Copyrighted Motion Pictures
Reference#:        16669172 (M)
IP Address:        67.19.136.38
Date of Infringement: 3 Nov 2004 02:11:32 EDT (GMT -0400)



Dear Lance Crosby, JD:

The Motion Picture Association of America (MPAA) represents the following
motion picture production and distribution companies:

Columbia Pictures Industries, Inc.
Disney Enterprises, Inc.
Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Studios Inc.
Paramount Pictures Corporation
TriStar Pictures, Inc.
Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation
United Artists Pictures, Inc.
United Artists Corporation
Universal City Studios, LLLP
Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc.

We have received information that, at the above noted date and time, the IP
address 67.19.136.38 was used to offer or to materially contribute to the
offering of downloadable or streaming copies of copyrighted motion pictures.
The title(s) offered included:

HOME ON THE RANGE
RESIDENT EVIL
DAWSON'S CREEK (TV)
RUNAWAY JURY
OUT OF TIME
SNOW WHITE AND THE SEVEN DWARFS
DIE HARD 2
COLD MOUNTAIN
MATRIX 2, THE aka THE MATRIX RELOADED
BORN ON THE FOURTH OF JULY
DINOSAUR
50 FIRST DATES
UNDERWORLD
LAST STARFIGHTER, THE
JEEPERS CREEPERS 2
JACKASS THE MOVIE
HIDALGO
FORREST GUMP
TAKING LIVES
10 THINGS I HATE ABOUT YOU
IMPOSTOR
THUNDERBIRDS
FRIENDS (TV)
MATRIX REVOLUTIONS, THE
OSMOSIS JONES
BIG FISH
BUTTERFLY EFFECT, THE
DREAMERS, THE
X-FILES, THE  Season 9
HOW HIGH
HOUSE OF FLYING DAGGERS
LAST SAMURAI, THE
SLEEPY HOLLOW (1999)
AMERICAN PIE II
BOURNE IDENTITY, THE
ARMAGEDDON

Specifically, we have identified the following material as infringing:

------------------------------

Filepath: 3600.torrent

First Found: 26 Oct 2004 10:07:52 EDT (GMT -0400)
Last Found: 26 Oct 2004 10:07:52 EDT (GMT -0400)
Filesize: 706,962k
IP Address: 67.19.136.38
IP Port: 80
Network: BTTrackers
Protocol: BitTorrent
